name: Saria Reclaimed
description:
A Brief on Gameplay

Saria's journey will take her through a colorful and diverse world filled with various characters and creatures to fight or lewdly tire out within the battle system.

Losing a battle is not the end of the world, merely the end of purity.

Throughout the game enemies might get teased by Saria's state, making them take increasingly lewd actions from trying too woo her with not so smooth dirty talks to fondling her.

As Saria's willpower decreases she will engage in more degenerate actions, be it for pleasure or for profit.
